prompts: Create an ice-type Pokemon with elegant wings and a serene expression.
I want a majestic bird Pokemon soaring through a snowy landscape.
Generate a legendary Pokemon that embodies the essence of winter and freedom.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a beautiful ice fairy with flowing feathers.
Imagine a powerful ice-themed creature with sharp, glacial features and a calm demeanor.
Design a Pokemon that has a bright blue color palette and a graceful flight.
Give me an icy avian Pokemon that commands the respect of its territory.
